description1.title: Solar at Night
description1.description: iCON ensures the battery is fully charged by sunset. This stored energy can be used for customers with low yield which effectively is Solar usage at Night

description2.title: Battery Charging Inhibition
description2.description: iCON controls charging of battery from Mains via patent pending technology. Returns upto additional 1 unit savings per day

description3.title: Adaptive
description3.description: With its inbuilt AI Algorithm, iCON optimises the energy delivery and ensure 2X savings compared to the Competitors

description4.title: Future Ready

description5.title: Faster Payback
description5.description: iCON Systems can give ROI within 4 -6 years while conventional Solar charge controllers might take 8 - 12 years

section1.description: iCUBE is a candidate for being Indiaâ€™s first 5 star rated Solar UPS. technology.heading: Our Technology
technology.description: Power Electronics, Embedded Firmware, AI, IoT and Cloud Technologies

section1.title: We Innovate
section1.description3: to work seamlessly with all existing inverters and UPS systems already installed currently in customer sites. It also allows our products to control/inhibit battery charging from utility grid to provide additional savings.
section1.description4: AI helps in predicting load usage and energy availability patterns to make sure that the solar energy available is utilized to maximum and the batteries are fully charged back to from solar panels by sunset

section2.heading: Coulomb Counting
section2.description: Customers using lead acid batteries for legacy systems can switch to Lithium based or new chemistry batteries down the line using iCON/ iCUBE as both uses a coulomb counting method. A segment first option. A configuration update that can be done OTA or by the person changing the batteries can make the change.

section3.heading: Transparency
section3.description: We are transparent to the Customer showing how much energy is generated from Solar PV and how much is saved from inhibiting utility charging of batteries or by the inhibition function. No other competitor in this segment shows this data.

section4.heading: Robust Engineering
section4.description: We follow a stage gate product development process. The outcomes at each stage will be validated and signed off by the internal customer. Advancement to the next stage will depend on the customer feedback, review and acceptance. An evidence-based approach is followed and all major standards as listed by the compliance agency are planned in the start of any project. We follow similar procedures used by Tier 1 corporations for the product development process. An Engineering Change Record/Engineering Change Notice (ECR/ECN) process is used for any changes and all failures will go through a Failure Analysis (FA) process with proper root cause analysis and the required corrective action is generated and documented.

section1.title: Our Mission
section1.description1: Energy24by7 is a platform developed and owned by NyQuest Innovation Labs Private Limited to market the products & solutions the company develops in the upcoming energy space. The company was incorporated in 2017 with a vision to design and develop products in the energy and storage domain. Our team is a mix of young and experienced passionate professionals with 80+ years of collective experience in AI and power electronics.
section1.description3: to develop products that add value to the sustainable energy chain without compromising on efficiencies in energy delivery.

section2.title: Our Core Values
section2.point1: Planet First: If we have to choose between profits and planet, our planet will come first as we have only one.
section2.point2: Think loud about our ideas. Listen, discuss, and then decide
section2.point3: Great things are always done by a team of people

section3.title: Our Mantra
section3.description2: rest of us bring data to the table.

section1.title: NyQuest Innovation Labs Pvt Ltd
section1.description1: NyQuest Innovation Labs Pvt Ltd ('us', 'we', or 'our') operates the website and the mobile application (the 'Service') as a medium for providing information to users on the real time data of the products sold under the Energy24by7 banner.
section1.description2: This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.
section1.description3: We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.

section2.title: Information Collection and Use
section2.description1: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
section2.description2: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ('Personal Data'). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
list: Location and details of solar power plant package installed
section2.description3: We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access the Service by or through a mobile device ('Usage Data').
section2.description4: This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
section2.description5: When you access the Service by or through a mobile device, this Usage Data may include information such as the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
section2.description6: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information.
section2.description7: Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.
section2.description8: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
list2: Session Cookies. We use Session Cookies to operate our Service.
Preference Cookies. We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.
Security Cookies. We use Security Cookies for security purposes.

section3.title: Use of Data
section3.description1: NyQuest Innovation Labs Pvt Ltd uses the collected data for various purposes:
list: To provide and maintain the Service
To notify you about changes to our Service
To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so
To provide customer care and support
To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service
To monitor the usage of the Service
To detect, prevent and address technical issues

section4.title: Transfer Of Data
section4.description1: Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to â€” and maintained on â€” computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction.
section4.description2: If you are located outside India and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to India and process it there.
section4.description3: Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer.
section4.description4: NyQuest Innovation Labs Pvt Ltd will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information.

section5.title: Disclosure Of Data
section5.description: NyQuest Innovation Labs Pvt Ltd may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
list: To comply with a legal obligation
To protect and defend the rights or property of NyQuest Innovation Labs Pvt Ltd
To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public

section6.title: Security Of Data
section6.description1: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

section7.title: Service Providers
section7.description1: We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ('Service Providers'), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
section7.description2: These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

section8.title: Analytics
section8.description1: We may use third-party Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service.

section9.title: Links To Other Sites
section9.description1: Our App may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
section9.description2: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

section10.title: Children's Privacy
section10.description1: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ('Children').
section10.description2: We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children have provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.

section11.title: Changes To This Privacy Policy
section11.description1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
section11.description2: We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the 'effective date' at the top of this Privacy Policy.
section11.description3: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

section12.title: Contact Us
section12.description1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
